edge: Beginning of production for the film Gulaal in 2001, inspired by Mohammad Rafi songs from Pyaasa and dedication to poet Sahir Ludhianvi.
Director Anurag Kashyap overseeing the production of Gulaal, beginning in 2001.
Inspiration for Gulaal's production drawn from the songs of the movie Pyaasa and Mohammad Rafi.
Dedication to poet Sahir Ludhianvi in the production of Gulaal.
Story idea for Gulaal by Raj Singh Chaudhary, who later played the role of Dilip Singh in the film.
Production of Gulaal delayed for three years due to censorship issues with Anurag Kashyap's previous film Paanch.
First trailer for Gulaal released with the director's other movie Dev D.
